entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AccessViolationException when calling Process.HandleCount #107503
  • JsonSchemaExporter.GetJsonSchemaAsNode "format" output cannot be controlled by configuration #107501
  • error CS8784: Generator 'DownlevelLibraryImportGenerator' failed to initialize on osx-arm64 #107497
  • [API Proposal]: Add constructor to StreamReader and StreamWriter accepting ArrayPools #107490

Closed

  • NativeAOT incorrect native code when assigning unmanaged function pointer to struct member #107396
    9.0.0
  • Faulting module name: coreclr.dll, version: 6.0.3224.31407 #104675

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Disable UnitTest_GVM_TypeLoadException for fullAOT jobs #107502
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] JIT: don't create vector constants from relocatable constants #107500
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert Thread FCalls to QCalls #107495
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [PERF] For slow perf runs, change release/9.0 to only be on schedule and main to only be batched. #107494
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm: Consider the fact that targetReg can be second half during resolution #107493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix corner-case accounting bug in new codeheap allocation #107492
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: don't create vector constants from relocatable constants #107491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_SWITCH opcode in jiterpreter #107423
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Extend the list of recognized `SearchValues<char>` field names in Regex #107402
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix module being set as tenured too early #107489
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Normalize `--` and case for options in src/tests/build.sh like we do in eng/build(-commons).sh #107425
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Improve error message when running `dotnet app.exe` #107484
    area-Host
  • [release/9.0] Fix EVP_MAC_CTX cleanup in one shot #107471
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix thread static cleanup paths #107438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add simple late layout pass #107483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop canonicalization #107371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add ability to overwrite file permissions for dotnet commands #9645
    Backlog

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • `dotnet workload restore` installs "aspire" though it isn't needed or wanted #42486
  • `dotnet run` - Notify user of segmentation fault #43250

PullRequests

Merged

  • manually port the loc build update #43265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Summary of how we do localization in this repo #43202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/9.0.1xx] ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #43262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in SyntaxNode.FindNode #75014

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35306.52 #75012

PullRequests

Created

  • Use numbered lists in `IOperation` documentation #75016
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • F# unnecessary parentheses analyzer shim #75015
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Convert RudeEditDiagnostic to Diagnostic in EmitSolutionUpdateAsync #75013
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Workaround for InvalidOperationException thrown from EmitSolutionUpdateResults.GetAllDiagnosticsAsync #75011
    Interactive-Debugging, Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #57744
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, json_middleware, json_spring #57743
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, json_spring #57741
  • Perf improvement: caching, mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter #57740
  • WebApplicationFactory disposes host before StopAsync on background service is called #57738
  • unable to gracefully handle Blazor component rendering errors, such as Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] #57737

Closed

  • Perf improvement: single_query, single_query #57722
  • Provision to handle Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] error #57724
  • Perf regression: fortunes #57700
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #57733
  • Blazor: the parent component always is disposed before the child components. #57704

PullRequests

Updated

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing` package README #57736
    area-mvc
  • Update ANCM file monitoring to hopefully avoid unneeded shutdowns #57735
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Thank You to Our Outstanding Contributors: @MartyIX and @albyrock87 #24650
  • Provide more exception source info from the throwing codes #24648
  • [iOS] platform specific for entry's keyboard to have a done button #24644
  • The events of the NetworkListManager will not be triggered in a MAUI project. #24643
  • Please support Linux as soon as possible, this is important for cross-platform developers #24642

Closed

  • Border has an unexpected background animation #21643
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Starting Community Triagers process in our repo #23167
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • Trigger InvalidateMeasure event on CollectionView when content size changes #24647
    community ✨
  • Update TriageProcess.md #24646
    community ✨
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] platform specific for entry's keyboard to have a done button #24645
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Remove duplicate versions of tests #24611

Updated

  • Fix layout when MinimumWidth/HeightRequest is removed on Windows #24639
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    community ✨
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • [ci] Build with arcade #24625
  • Don't invalidate SuperView if not connected to Window #24637
